sentences.sContent: In reading his memoirs, In retrospect, I discovered one of the reasons why.
sentences.sContent_eng: In reading his memoirs, In retrospect, I discovered one of the reasons why.
sentences.sCn: 回想一下，从阅读他的回忆录中，我发现了其中的原因之一。

sentences.sContent: The respectful spectator gave the prospective president a retrospect of the spectacular spectrum.
sentences.sContent_eng: The respectful spectator gave the prospective president a retrospect of the spectacular spectrum.
sentences.sCn: 恭敬的旁观者对未来的总统回顾了壮观的光谱（景象）。

sentences.sContent: I do think what I've discovered is that a journey can add depth and dimension to a life and even, in retrospect, represent it.
sentences.sContent_eng: I do think what I've discovered is that a journey can add depth and dimension to a life and even, in retrospect, represent it.
sentences.sCn: 我认为我发现的道理是，一次旅行可以增加你生命的深度和广度，甚至在你回顾一生的时候可以侃侃而谈。

phrases.pCn: 回顾；回顾往事；检讨过去

words.tran: 回顾的；怀旧的；可追溯的

trans.tranOther: thinking back to a time in the past, especially with the advantage of knowing more now than you did then
